name: gbff
title: G.B.F.F.
description: G.B.F.F. is a series of artist’s multiples from 2013, made from found objects. The off-brand purses’ interior lining has been replaced with gay pornography. The purses serve as a direct reference to the commodification, fetishization, and desexualization of gay men by straight women. Purses, being a stereotypically feminine object, juxtaposed with the gay pornography inside, call to mind the straight woman/gay man relationship. The cheap, “knock-off” style of the purses reflects the shallow nature of a fetishized relationship. The gay pornography that lines the interior provides both a reference to gay men and calls to question the desexualization of gay men by straight women in these fetishized relationships. The title, G.B.F.F. stands for “Gay Best Friend Forever”, a common phrase used by straight women in describing their relationship with a gay man whom they fetishize. The 'gay' modifier serves to distinguish the relationship from any other friendship, which simultaneously commodifies and otherizes the gay male.
